name: VR Sleigh Simulator - Cardboard
description:
It's Sleigh Simulator time ! Just take your Sleigh and slide.
Have fun !

Features
- Full 3D immersion
- Intense sound FX designed
- Compatible with virtual reality viewers such as Google Cardboard.

How to play
Turn with your Head right or left to control the sleigh
Your goal is to collect coins so much as possible.

We hope you will enjoy.
